properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
  '{Config.sourceSystem}'  SRC_SYS_CD,
F3002_adt.ixtbm AS BOM_CAT_CD,
concat(F3002_adt.ixkit,\";\",F3002_adt.ixmmcu,\";\",F3002_adt.ixtbm,\";\",F3002_adt.ixbqty,\";\",F3002_adt.ixcoby,\";\",F3002_adt.ixcpnb,\";\",F3002_adt.ixsbnt) AS BOM_NUM,
F3002_adt.ixitm AS BOM_ITM_NODE_NUM,
concat(F3002_adt.ixcpnt,\".\",F3002_adt.ixsbnt) AS BOM_ITM_CNTR_NBR,
CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(ixefff)) = 'null' OR TRIM(ixefff) = '' OR TRIM(ixefff) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(ixefff) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(ixefff) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS BOM_ITM_VLD_FROM_DTTM,
TRIM(F3002_adt.ixrvno) AS CHG_NUM,
NULL AS DEL_IND,
NULL AS PREV_NODE_NUM,
NULL AS PREV_ITM_CNTR_NBR,
CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(ixefff)) = 'null' OR TRIM(ixefff) = '' OR TRIM(ixefff) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(ixefff) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(ixefff) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS CRT_DTTM,
CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(ixupmj)) = 'null' OR TRIM(ixupmj) = '' OR TRIM(ixupmj) = '0' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) ELSE to_timestamp(concat(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(F3002_adt.ixupmj) AS INT) + 1900000 as string),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(F3002_adt.ixupmj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS string), 1, 10),' ', lpad(TRIM(ixtday), 6, '0')), \"yyyy-MM-dd HHmmss\") END AS CHG_DTTM,
TRIM(F3002_adt.ixlitm) AS CMPNT_NUM,
NULL AS BOM_ITM_CAT_CD,
TRIM(F3002_adt.ixcpnt) AS BOM_ITM_NUM,
TRIM(F3002_adt.ixum) AS CMPNT_UOM_CD,
cast(TRIM(F3002_adt.ixqnty) as decimal(18,4)) AS CMPNT_QTY,
TRIM(F3002_adt.ixfvbt) AS FX_QTY_IND,
cast(TRIM(F3002_adt.ixscrp) as decimal(18,4)) AS CMPNT_SCRAP_QTY_PCT,
cast(TRIM(F3002_adt.ixstpp) as decimal(18,4)) AS OPR_SCRAP_QTY_PCT,
NULL  AS BOM_ITM_BULK_IND,
cast(TRIM(F3002_adt.ixlovd) as decimal(18,4)) AS LEAD_TIME_OFFST_DAYS_QTY,
NULL AS DSTN_KEY_CD,
NULL AS ALT_ITM_IND,
NULL AS ALT_ITM_QTY_PCT,
TRIM(F3002_adt.ixdsc1) AS BOM_ITM_TXT,
NULL AS GR_DAYS_LEAD_QTY,
NULL AS CO_PROD_IND,
NULL AS ALT_ITM_STRTGY_CD,
TRIM(F3002_adt.ixsbnt) AS ALT_ITM_RNKNG_NBR,
NULL AS ALT_ITM_GRP_CD,
CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(ixefft)) = 'null' OR TRIM(ixefft) = '' OR TRIM(ixefft) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(ixefft) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(ixefft) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS BOM_ITM_VLD_TO_DTTM,
TRIM(F3002_adt.ixcmcu) AS ISU_PLNT,
NULL AS TECH_STS_FROM,
NULL AS USER_WHO_CRT_REC,
NULL AS NM_OF_PRSN_WHO_CHG_OBJ,
NULL AS SRT_STRNG,
NULL AS NET_SCRAP_IN,
NULL AS MATL_PRVSN_IN,
NULL AS SPARE_PART_IN,
NULL AS ITM_RLVNT_TO_SLS_IN,
NULL AS ITM_RLVNT_TO_PRDTN_IN,
NULL AS ITM_RLVNT_TO_PLNT_MAINT_IN,
NULL AS FOR_RLVNC_TO_COST_IN,
NULL AS ITM_RLVNT_TO_ENGR_IN,
NULL AS HIGH_LVL_CNFG_IN,
NULL AS PM_ASBL_IN,
NULL AS BOM_IS_RCURSV_IN,
NULL AS RCURSV_ALLW_IN,
NULL AS CAD_IN,
NULL AS FLLP_MATL_BOM_ITM,
NULL AS PRCHSNG_GRP,
NULL AS DELV_TIME_IN_DAYS,
NULL AS ACCT_NUM_OF_SUP,
NULL AS PRICE,
NULL AS PRC_UNIT,
NULL AS CRNCY_KEY,
NULL AS COST_ELMNT,
NULL AS REQ_NUM_OF_VAR_SIZE_ITM,
NULL AS SIZE_1,
NULL AS SIZE_2,
NULL AS SIZE_3,
NULL AS UNIT_OF_MEAS_FOR_SZ_1_TO_3,
NULL AS VAR_SZ_ITM_QTY_PER_PIECE,
NULL AS FRML_KEY_FOR_VAR_SZ_ITM,
NULL AS SUB_ITM_EXIST_IN,
NULL AS ITM_IN_MORE_THN_ONE_ALT,
NULL AS LONG_TEXT_LANG,
NULL AS OBJ_TYPE,
NULL AS MATL_GRP,
NULL AS DOC_TYPE,
NULL AS DOC_NUM ,
NULL AS DOC_VERS,
NULL AS DOC_PART,
NULL AS AVG_MATL_PURITY_IN_PERCNT,
NULL AS CLS_NUM,
NULL AS CLS_TYPE,
NULL AS RSLTNG_ITM_CAT,
NULL AS SLCT_IN_FOR_CNFG_BOM,
NULL AS INST_IN,
NULL AS NOT_DSPL_IN_CNFG_EDITR_IN,
NULL AS NOT_DSPL_IN_SNGL_LVL_CNFG,
NULL AS NOT_DSPL_IN_AUTO_CNFG_IN,
NULL AS PRCHSNG_ORG,
NULL AS REQ_CMPNT,
NULL AS MLT_SLCT_ALLW,
NULL AS ALT_DSPLY_FMT,
NULL AS ORG_AREA,
NULL AS NUM_OF_OBJ_WTH_ASGN_DPND,
NULL AS ISS_LOC_FOR_PRDTN_ORDR,
NULL AS INTRA_MATL,
NULL AS RSTRC_EXIST_IN,
NULL AS INHRT_NODE_NUM_OF_BOM_ITM,
NULL AS LAST_DT_SHFT_DTTM,
NULL AS NM_OF_THE_USER,
NULL AS EXPLS_TYPE,
NULL AS FLLP_ITM_IN,
NULL AS FLLP_GRP,
NULL AS DSCNT_GRP,
NULL AS MAN_CHG_TO_SLS_ORDR_BOM_IN,
NULL AS BOM_ITM_CHG_DPND_IN,
NULL AS BOM_CAT_OF_ORIG_SLS_ORDR,
NULL AS BOM_FOR_ORIG_SLS_ORDR,
NULL AS NODE_NUM_OF_ORIG_SLS_ORDR,
NULL AS CNTR_FOR_ORIG_SLS_ORDR,
NULL AS CLSN_NUM,
NULL AS CLSN_AS_SLCT_COND_IN,
NULL AS DT_SHFT_HIER_IN,
NULL AS PRDTN_SUPL_AREA,
NULL AS LDTM_OFFST_FOR_OPR,
NULL AS UNIT_FOR_LDTM_OFFST_FOR_OPR ,
NULL AS ITM_GRP,
NULL AS HIST_CNTR,
NULL AS CMPNT_VRNT,
NULL AS ALE_IN,
NULL AS EXTRNL_ID_OF_AN_ITM,
NULL AS TEMP_NOT_USED,
NULL AS SPL_PRCMT_TYPE_FOR_BOM_ITM,
NULL AS REF_PT_FOR_BOM_TFR,
NULL AS GLOBL_ID_OF_AN_ITM_CHG_STS,
NULL AS SEG_MANTN_FOR_BOM_CMPNT,
NULL AS SEG_VAL,
NULL AS VALID_TO_DTTM,
NULL AS CHG_NUM_TO,
NULL AS CHG_NUM_TO_1,
NULL AS INHRT_NODE_NUM_OF_BOM_ITM_1,
NULL AS UTC_TIME_STMP_LONG_DTTM,
NULL AS NUM_OF_CU_INSTNCE,
NULL AS DEVT_VAL_MANTN_FOR_CMPNT,
NULL AS QTY_DSTN_PRFL,
NULL AS REF_TO_QTY_DSTN_PRFL,
NULL AS CRIT_CMPNT_IN,
NULL AS CRIT_LVL_OF_A_CMPNT_IN_BOM,
NULL as FUNC_ID,
NULL AS SER_NUM,
NULL AS BTCH_NUM
from {Config.sourceDatabase}.F3002_adt F3002_adt
WHERE F3002_adt._deleted_ = 'F'  
 
""")
